message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal of money.
I understand you want a sizable share, Alice, but this is more equitable. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
Bob, let's be realistic. I'm willing to compromise, but this needs to be fair for both of us. Time is ticking!

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than fair considering the time pressure.  Take it or leave it.
